TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AssemblyKeyFileAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AssemblyKeyFileAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AssemblyKeyFileAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定包含用來產生強式名稱金鑰組的檔案名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of a file containing the key pair used to generate a strong name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當建立強式名稱組件，作者必須提供這兩個屬性或。When building a strong-named assembly, the author must supply either this attribute or . 如果也已經指定，就有這個檔案將只包含公開金鑰。If has also been specified, it is likely that this file will only contain the public key. 語法的範例是`[assembly:AssemblyKeyFileAttribute("myKey.snk")]`。An example of the syntax is `[assembly:AssemblyKeyFileAttribute("myKey.snk")]`. > [!CAUTION] > 因為保存的路徑和檔案名稱，請確定您使用的字串`AssemblyKeyFileAttribute`不包含機密資訊。Since the path and file name persist, ensure that the string you use with `AssemblyKeyFileAttribute` does not contain sensitive information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性附帶。The following code example shows the use of the attribute with the . 若要編譯此範例中，您必須建立名為 TestPublicKey.snk 使用強式名稱金鑰檔[Sn.exe （強式名稱工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md):To compile this example, you must create a strong-name key file named TestPublicKey.snk using the [Sn.exe (Strong Name Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md): ```console sn -k TestPublicKey.snk ``` 編譯為.dll 的範例。Compile the example as a .dll. 如果您從命令列編譯時，使用`/t:library`選項 C# 或 Visual Basic 或`/LD`Visual c + + 連結器選項。If you compile from the command line, use the `/t:library` option for C# or Visual Basic, or the `/LD` linker option for Visual C++. [!code-cpp[AssemblyDelaySignattribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyDelaySignAttribute/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyDelaySignattribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyDelaySignAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyDelaySignattribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyDelaySignAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string keyFile) cil managed

param.name: keyFile
param.span: 包含金鑰組的檔案名稱。

span.span: The name of the file containing the key pair.

summary.span: 使用檔案名稱來初始化 類別的新執行個體，該檔案包含金鑰組，用來產生使用屬性之組件的強式名稱。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the file containing the key pair to generate a strong name for the assembly being attributed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 沒有預設路徑為建構函式。There is no default path for the constructor. 建構函式所設定的值會解譯由連結器，或由[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]，會叫用連結器。The value set by the constructor is interpreted by the linker, or by [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)], that invokes the linker. 預設設定[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)工具會假設的索引鍵的檔案是在目前的目錄。The default setting for the [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) tool assumes that the key file is in the current directory. 在[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，Visual Basic 和 Visual C# 編譯器建置並連結到專案目錄的子目錄，因此，如果您將金鑰檔放在專案目錄的相對路徑可能是"..\\..\keyfile.snk 「 或 」...在 Visual Basic 中的 \keyfile.snk"或"...\\\\..\\\keyfile.snk 「 或 」...\\\keyfile.snk"C# 中。In [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], the Visual Basic and Visual C# compilers build and link to subdirectories of the project directory, so if you put the key file in the project directory the relative path might be "..\\..\keyfile.snk" or "..\keyfile.snk" in Visual Basic, or "..\\\\..\\\keyfile.snk" or "..\\\keyfile.snk" in C#. C# 中，可以在專案屬性中設定這個屬性。For C#, this attribute can be set in the project properties. > [!CAUTION] > 因為保存的路徑和檔案名稱，所以請確認您使用的字串`AssemblyKeyFileAttribute`不包含機密資訊。Because the path and file name persist, ensure that the string you use with `AssemblyKeyFileAttribute` does not contain sensitive information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyFile As String
public: property System::String ^ KeyFile { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得檔案的名稱，該檔案包含金鑰組，用來產生使用屬性之組件的強式名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the file containing the key pair used to generate a strong name for the attributed assembly.

value.span: 字串，含有包含金鑰組的檔案名稱。

span.span: A string containing the name of the file that contains the key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 因為保存的路徑和檔案名稱，所以請確認您使用的字串`AssemblyKeyFileAttribute`不包含機密資訊。Because the path and file name persist, ensure that the string you use with `AssemblyKeyFileAttribute` does not contain sensitive information.
